score.description: The score to be granted when this Score Event is fired.

text.description: The text to be displayed when this Score Event is fired. The text will be displayed at a position of where the Score Event has been fired. By default, this is the raw score value.

font.description: The font which will be used to display the score text. If not specified, the score text will not appear.

fonts.description: If the event can display the score in different fonts, use this object. Cannot coexist with font.
fonts.markdownDescription: If the event can display the score in different fonts, use this object. Cannot coexist with `font`.

options.description: A list of fonts, one of which will be picked.

default.description: The default font, if the choice matches none of the above choices.

choice.description: An integer expression which evaluates to a number identifying one of the options.
